Defendant whose motion to suppress was recommended for denial by the Magistrate Judge and who appeared to concede that the route taken would be convenient for smugglers, testified in a hearing about his vehicle not going off the road
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Luis Trevino: United States Border Patrol Agent with nearly seven years of experience, stationed at the Freer checkpoint, who has been working there two or three days a week since August 2011 and recognizes ninety to ninety-five percent of the vehicles passing down FM 2050, pursued the defendants and conducted registration checks
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Reymundo Reyes: Law enforcement officer who conducted a traffic stop of Ignacio Rodriguez and issued a citation, later impounded the vehicle due to lack of insurance information and uncertainty about the vehicle's ownership
